title: Smartwatch global unit sales forecast 2014 to 2015
summary: You are viewing a chart of multi-line type with 7 lines denoting Western Europe, Asia Pacific, North America, Central and Eastern Europe, China, South America, and Middle East and Africa. The y axis indicates the Unit sales in millions and the x axis indicates Year.

Overall Asia Pacific, and North America are rapidly increasing, Western Europe, Central and Eastern Europe, China, South America, and Middle East and Africa are gradually increasing,  throughout the Year
Asia Pacific, and North America has increased by 6.7, and 6.2 times respectively.
Throughout the period, North America generally had the highest Unit sales in millions relative to others with an average of 4.3, and it reached its maximum at 2015 with a value of 7.4.
Followed by Asia Pacific which ranks as the second topmpost line , with an average of 3.9 Unit sales in millions,reaching its highest point  at 2015 with a value of 6.7.
South America mostly had the least Unit sales in millions with a mean value of 0.35, which peaked at 2015 with a value of 0.6.
